attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
But then I don’t really want the Government to run the referendum because of the way they play with figures and stuff.  We would go through the whole process. Then it would only be “you have all voted against the Euro.  Not the EU.  Oh and by the way the new name for the Euro is Buro and we have joined”   When I think the majority want out of Europe totally.  
I WANT AN INDEMPENDENT REFURENDOM.  With questions like
1)	Totally in Europe 
2)	Totally in Europe without Euro
3)	OUT OF EUROPE

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
